FuncDef:
The ike identity command configures a filter set used in IKE negotiation and displays the IKE filter set view.
The undo ike identity command deletes a filter set.
By default, no filter set used in IKE negotiation is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the filter set name.
The value is a string of 1 to 15 case-insensitive characters.

ExtraInfo: To configure a filter set used in IKE negotiation, run the ike identity command. If an IKE peer meets filter conditions, IKE negotiation is successful, and the IKE peer can access. If an IKE peer does not meet filter conditions, IKE negotiation fails.
